channel.title: Retail Expansion on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Retail Expansion on FinanClub

item.title: UAA
item.description: score:54 Chances: Under Armour reported a revenue and earnings beat in the first quarter of fiscal 2024, with direct-to-consumer revenues rising 4%. Under Armour is assessing potential wholesale partners in various retail channels, indicating potential expansion opportunities. Positive earnings and revenue surprises in the previous quarter suggest potential positive momentum.

item.title: JWN
item.description: score:1040 Chances: Nordstrom plans to open a new Nordstrom Rack store in Queen Creek, Arizona, expanding its retail presence. Nordstrom announces the date for reporting its second quarter 2023 financial results and provides an outlook for the year. Nordstrom’s Relative Strength (RS) Rating improves, indicating improving technical performance.
